title: Avengers: Infinity War
about: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

title: The Godfather
about: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: Inception
about: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: The Dark Knight
about: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham. The Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Pulp Fiction
about: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: It
about: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shapeshifting monster that disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, Maine.

title: Chucky
about: Chucky, a doll possessed by the soul of a serial killer, terrorizes a young boy and his family.

title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
about: A blacksmith named Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate Captain Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from cursed pirates.

title: Batman Begins
about: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
about: A group of rebels, including Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, and Han Solo, fight against the oppressive Galactic Empire and seek to destroy the Death Star.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
about: An orphaned boy discovers he is a wizard on his 11th birthday and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, where he learns about his magical heritage and battles dark forces.

title: The Beach
about: A young backpacker discovers a secret island community in Thailand and becomes involved in its complicated social dynamics.

title: Memoirs of a Geisha
about: A young Japanese girl is sold to a geisha house and learns the art of being a geisha, all while navigating love, jealousy, and betrayal in pre-World War II Japan.

title: The 13th Warrior
about: A Muslim ambassador travels to the frozen North where he joins a group of Vikings to fight a mysterious and deadly foe.
